scripts.dev: node ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.frontend:build: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.frontend:lint: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run lint
